name: Older Sister III
description: "To protect us, as she once protected me." —Executor Hideo

name: True Prophecy
description: "Some claim to know the future better than we do. Listen carefully. Then ask yourself: do their words ring true or false?" —Lakshmi-2

name: Pribina-D
description: Adventure is in your blood.

name: Bad News
description: Sit down. We need to talk.

name: The Old Fashioned
description: This is the way things were.

name: Midnight Coup
description: The conspirators were too afraid to kill me—rightly so. I am the beloved father of the people, and the glorious mob would not suffer my death. My sentence was exile.

name: Halfdan-D
description: Your name will ring out, your deeds will resound forever.

name: Prosecutor
description: "All this in service of one purpose. You have their attention. Let us see if you can keep it." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Sunshot
description: "Can't outrun the sunrise." —Liu Feng

name: Shattered Peace
description: Only you can make it whole again.

name: The Number
description: "Ah, but which number? Why it and no others?" —Lakshmi-2

name: The Steady Hand
description: Forged in honor of Perun, and a just and unwavering resolve.

name: Daedalus Code
description: Make your own escape.

name: Dire Promise
description: "If you think this world ends well, you are mistaken." —Arach Jalaal

name: Valakadyn
description: In dark water, my fangs are bared.

name: Hard Light
description: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.

name: Imset HC4
description: The City's foes ready themselves for the end.

name: Athelflad-D
description: Make yourself dreadful to your enemies and indispensable to your allies.

name: Minimum Distance
description: All I need is a little breathing room.

name: Annual Skate
description: "When the lake used to freeze, people would dance on the ice wearing boots with tiny swords. And fall in love."

name: Restoration VIII
description: "We need proper tools if we are to rebuild." —Executor Hideo

name: Better Devils
description: Angels can't help you here.

name: Enigma's Draw
description: "Indeed, I traffic in all kinds of secrets and mysteries. Weapons, as well." —Lakshmi-2

name: Ghost Primus
description: The Ghost Primus was strong because of his disfigurement, not in spite of it. He alone had the vision to share my dream of a new, perfect world. Ghaul was a creature of singular beauty, and I loved him.

name: Drang
description: Since the Collapse, these pistols have been retooled several times to boost their firepower. A worn inscription reads, "To Victor, from Sigrun."

name: Jiangshi AR4
description: You can't outrun the dead.

name: Controlling Vision
description: "Once you see how the balance is tipped against us—once you see doom coming, inexorable and cold—then you must act." —Arach Jalaal

name: The Rattler
description: You'll never hear me coming.

name: Galliard-42
description: SUROS invites you to kick up your heels.

name: Etana SI4
description: The reign of Light will be long and peaceful.

name: Urchin-3si
description: I will draw them in, then take them out.

name: The Fool's Remedy
description: Forged in honor of Nirwen, and the righting of foolish wrongs.

name: Sweet Business
description: "…I love my job."

name: Sturm
description: These ancient ceremonial pistols can be dated back to the early Golden Age. A faded inscription reads, "To Sigrun, from Victor."

name: Timecard
description: Clock in for work.

name: Gravity Slingshot
description: "On the day our ships are ready, the City will see us blast into the sky." —Arach Jalaal

name: Solemn Hymn
description: Stand together and play the song that sounds across the stars.

name: The Forward Path
description: Forged in honor of Weyloran, and roads yet traveled.

name: Eleventh Hour
description: "We will save and protect anyone who joins Dead Orbit. There is a place on our ships for you." —Arach Jalaal

name: A Swift Verdict
description: “Judgment is final.” —Emissary of the Nine

name: Martyr's Make
description: Remember those who have gone before.

name: Good Bone Structure
description: This one is a real looker.

name: Deadpan Delivery
description: Emphasis on the "dead."

name: Veleda-D
description: Your victory is foreseen.

name: Last Hope
description: Remember what you fight for.

name: Unification VII
description: "To persuade others, we must show that we act in their interests." —Executor Hideo

name: Baligant
description: Defend that which is precious to you.

name: A Sudden Death
description: "Everything dies. This is proof." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Guiding Star
description: "We will make a new home out among the stars, and then we will know peace. Until that day..." —Arach Jalaal

name: Show of Force
description: How far will you go?

name: Dead Man Walking
description: Before you? I just remember searching. What do you remember from before me?

name: Perseverance
description: It was a long time coming. But it wasn't the wait. It was the journey.

name: Tractor Cannon
description: Property of Ishtar Collective. WARNING: Gravity propulsor beam can cause serious injury or even death.

name: Elegy-49
description: SUROS invites you to bring about the end.

name: First In, Last Out
description: "I don't know how it works. You just keep taking damage and keep firing."

name: Shepherd's Watch
description: Nobody talks about the day the Shepherd's staff became the Shepherd's rifle.

name: Widow's Bite
description: I will outlive you.

name: Eye of Foresight
description: "To perceive the future from a great distance is both a gift and a promise of triumph." —Lakshmi-2

name: Borealis
description: Light is a spectrum. Why limit yourself to a single hue?

name: Retrofuturist
description: They were so optimistic about us.

name: The Mornin' Comes
description: Fix your eye upon the rising sun.

name: Shock and Awe
description: Do not fear. Be what others fear.

name: Timelines' Vertex
description: "I give you this, to be sure that we meet again." —Lakshmi-2

name: Uriel's Gift
description: Take weapon in hand and fly to victory.

name: The Long Walk
description: "There is an end to everything." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Nox Echo III
description: Listen, and you will hear it.

name: Critical Sass
description: A chain reaction of nuclear insolence.

name: Cartesian Coordinate
description: Where does one end and the other begin?

name: Scathelocke
description: Our eyes squinted, our teeth clenched, our prayers answered.

name: Merciless
description: Entropy is inevitable.

name: Somerled-D
description: Heroes are not born, but made.

name: Rat King
description: We are small, but we are legion.

name: Gentleman Vagabond
description: Everyone loves a scoundrel.

name: Main Ingredient
description: "Now stir the sauce…"

name: Blue Shift
description: What is the color of the universe?

name: A Single Clap
description: Hold your applause till the end.

name: Morrigan-D
description: Your domain is the battlefield. Its ways are your ways.

name: Maxim XI
description: "Speak briefly and precisely, and what you say will penetrate to the heart." —Executor Hideo

name: Persuader
description: "They say you can't reason with these enemies. I dunno—my gun and I seem to manage just fine." —Kei-Ying

name: Hoosegow
description: Cause a stir.

name: Berenger's Memory
description: Take your place among the company of heroes.

name: Pentatonic-48
description: SUROS invites you to light it up.

name: Tarantula
description: No one will escape my web.

name: The Day's Fury
description: Forged in honor of Radegast, and righteous rage born anew.

name: The Wardcliff Coil
description: Ingenuity. Desperation. A haphazard prototype of terrible power. Such were the factors at play in the Wardcliff Incident.

name: Memory Interdict
description: "I have no time for nostalgia. Give me visions of braided futures, brilliantly aflame." —Lakshmi-2

name: Sins of the Past
description: What once was old shall be new again, and history will have its revenge.

name: Wicked Sister
description: The bad influence in the family.

name: It Stared Back
description: At the edge of the universe, I stared into the infinite deep. It stared back, and was pleased. I would become the herald of its victory, and bear witness for all creation.

name: Fighting Lion
description: "I call it the Zhang Fei. It hits almost as hard as I do." —Wei Ning

name: Acantha-D
description: Your piercing Light knows no limits; your searcher's heart, no bounds.

name: Honor's Edge
description: "Good leadership requires discernment: the art of finely dividing one subtle thing from another." —Executor Hideo

name: Eternity's Edge
description: "A sword is a wand that casts two spells: parry and cut." —Tarsem Sauer

name: Disrespectful Stare
description: Don't you look at me that way!

name: Erentil FR4
description: Bring on the sunrise.

name: Mos Epoch III
description: The perpetual eventually gives way to the variable.

name: Three Graves
description: "No need to dig too deep. Our slumber will not be disturbed." —Arach Jalaal

name: Swift Ride
description: It'll be over before you know it.

name: Inaugural Address
description: My first act as emperor was to send the Consul into the wasteland. The golden sun would burn away his corrupt form—a fitting symbol for the revolution that was to be my reign.

name: Bushwhacker
description: They'll never see you coming.

name: Negative Space
description: See the art in what's subtracted.

name: Quickfang
description: My smile is full of blades.

name: Complex Solution
description: A quantum algorithm, like a sword stroke, must be repeated until the solution is certain.

name: Alone as a god
description: I am the perfect loving god, and all will tremble to know me.

name: Nightshade
description: Three drops is all it takes.

name: Nergal PR4
description: Take arms against the lions of death, the kings of sunset.

name: Unspoken Promise
description: The promise is in the point of the blade.

name: Heart of Time
description: "Perhaps it exists. Perhaps it does not. Either we shall find it, or we shall become it." —Lakshmi-2

name: Flash and Thunder
description: Show them the Light.

name: Last Perdition
description: Can't outrun the ending.

name: The Time-Worn Spire
description: Forged in honor of Silimar, and persistence in the face of impossible odds.

name: Vigilance Wing
description: "The eye remains open. The Lighthouse remains lit." —Brother Vance

name: Does Not Compute
description: The engineers aren't ready for us.

name: Steel Sybil Z-14
description:
"Everything I touch falls apart! I see the fragments on the floor!"

"Well, isn't that a good thing? You know, if you're a sword?"

name: Call to Serve
description: "We have to do more than ask for help, Suraya. We have to give them something to believe in."

name: Tone Patrol
description: We are listening and watching.

name: Curtain Call
description: It's time for the final bow.

name: Copperhead-4sn
description: My fangs are bared.

name: Lincoln Green
description: The survivors of that day chose not to remember.

name: Conspirator
description: Did Ghaul always dream of a republic? What terrible worm burrowed into his heart that he would betray my love and plot against me?

name: Manannan SR4
description: Escort your foes to their defeat.

name: Frontier Justice
description: "…and after that, there will be time for questions."

name: Haunted Earth
description: "Those we've lost still linger in every place we look. Earth is no place for the living." —Arach Jalaal

name: Graviton Lance
description: Think of space-time as a tapestry on a loom. This weapon is the needle.

name: The Wizened Rebuke
description: Forged in honor of Skorri, of lessons learned and lessons taught.

name: Pleiades Corrector
description: "No, I don't think I'll tell you what it's for. That would be too easy." —Lakshmi-2

name: Black Scorpion-4sr
description: I attack from the shadows. I never miss.

name: Play of the Game
description: Show no mercy.

name: Contingency Plan
description: "The Traveler is an illusion. A false god. It will not save us. But this might." —Arach Jalaal

name: Eystein-D
description: We guarantee a fair trial.

name: Interregnum XVI
description: "Until a ruler arises, we act as simple trustees. Protecting. Receiving. Executing." —Executor Hideo

name: Crown-Splitter
description: "Our enemies think themselves gods and kings. Show them the error of their ways." —Callisto Yin

name: Skyburner's Oath
description: The inscription, written in a Cabal dialect, reads: "Victory or death!"

name: Seven-Six-Five
description: There's a rhythm to it.

name: Good Counsel IX
description: "Surround yourself with wise advisors." —Executor Hideo

name: Tango-45
description: SUROS invites you to be passionate.

name: Nameless Midnight
description: Strange things wake at the stroke of twelve.

name: Agenda 5
description: Fifth time's a charm.

name: Truthteller
description: "If we wish others to accept the grim reality, we must break through every comforting illusion." —Arach Jalaal

name: The Guiding Sight
description: Forged in honor of Efrideet, and all that inspires.

name: Song of Justice VI
description: "Justice must be true, swift, and utterly impartial." —Executor Hideo

name: The Prospector
description: "Some things should stay buried."
